column4: Is it possible to drag windows from one workspace to another?
yes, dont know if you can do it with metacity though
yes, they are non free though
you can download them free of charge, they are not free software though
How can you get an app for free, yet it not be free of charge?
the free refers to "freedom" not price, free software can cost money. when people talk of "free and open source software" they are mixing terms
open source software doesnt have to be free[dom]  but it _should_ be
like, some windows source code is available but you have to sign a non disclosure agreement to see it.. definatly not free
Free depends on your definition of cost.
the word free when talking about "free software" has nothing whatsoeverto do with the cost of the software.. it should be called freedom software but that sounds dumb
